data.name: Find Three Most-Occurring Words in a String
data.description: Disclaimer: This kata is based on a previous one which you can find here i.e. Most frequently used words in a text (https://www.codewars.com/kata/51e056fe544cf36c410000fb). Hence, this only serves as a translation of that kata in primitive C programming language. Task: Design a function named top_3_words to extract top 3 most-occurring words in a given string. The solution, when given a string, has to produce an array of strings, as shown below: Format: char** top_3_string(char* text); Restrictions in this Kata: 1. There would be no more than 150 unique words in each given string 2. Each unique word has a length not more than 20 alphabets Enjoy this kata!
